products.description: Hang onto that hairstyle for even longer. Infused with Vitamin B12 and Keratin, TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo is our secret weapon to refresh dry, dull hair between washes by removing excess oil and impurities.
products.title: Between Washes Basic Care Dry Shampoo

productsDetail.longPageDescription: Hang onto that hairstyle for even longer. Infused with Vitamin B12 and Keratin, TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo is our secret weapon to refresh dry, dull hair between washes by removing excess oil and impurities.
productsDetail.shortTitle: Between Washes Basic Care Dry Shampoo
productsDetail.aboutThisProductBullets:
• When you take the time to style your hair, you want it to last. The key to avoiding flat, lackluster hair is finding a dry shampoo that removes excess oil and delivers a boost of extra body.

• Infused with Vitamin B12 and Keratin, TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo is loaded with everything you need to keep your second day hair looking like you just styled it. 

• Perfect for all hair types, our weightless TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo transforms worn and dull hair into hair that looks clean, healthy and totally restored. 

• The best part? This oil absorbing dry shampoo won’t leave any visible residue, so you can make a hair statement and conquer the day whether you’re in between washes or you’re just looking for a hair refresh.

productsDetail.howToUseDescription:

products.description: Need your hairstyle to hold from day to night? TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Spray Smooth Extend Level 4 gives your look the hold it needs without that stiff feeling.
products.title: Compressed Micro Mist Level 4 Hair Spray

productsDetail.tryThisDesctiption: Want lasting hold and a style that moves with you? TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Sprays has you covered. With breakthrough technology, these compressed hair sprays deliver a weightless  mist, ensuring lasting hold while maintaining natural movement. TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Sprays are specially designed to deliver great performance with 50% less gas than our traditional 11oz cans. These smaller, sleek new bottles have the same amount of product and last you as long as the traditional 11oz cans. Create your hairstyles with TRESemmé products and finish with one of the Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Sprays (at four different levels of hold) so you can lock in your style from day to night.
productsDetail.longPageDescription: Need your hairstyle to hold from day to night? TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Spray Smooth Extend Level 4 gives your look the hold it needs without that stiff feeling.
productsDetail.shortTitle: Compressed Micro Mist Level 4 Hair Spray
productsDetail.aboutThisProductBullets:
• TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Spray Smooth Extend Level 4 gives you all day hold for your boldest looks… without the stiffness of traditional hair spray. Get a natural, flexible hold that moves with you while keeping humidity at bay. This hair spray is fast-drying and humidity resistant, leaving you with a look you can rock (and stays in place). 

• The revolutionary micro-mist formula delivers great performance with 50% less gas than our traditional 11oz cans. The superfine micro-mist penetrates through the top layer of hair, providing deeper coverage throughout. Natural movement, flexibility, and a lasting hold… all in one sleek new 5.5oz can.

products.description: For the manageable and gorgeous curls and waves, TRESemmé Flawless Curls Conditioner for curly hair provides hydration to detangle hair and tame frizz.
products.title: Flawless Curls Conditioner

productsDetail.tryThisDesctiption: Ideal for curly or wavy hair, TRESemmé Flawless Curls  Conditioner provides optimal curl hydration to detangle hair and tame frizz.
productsDetail.longPageDescription:
Curls need work and the right curly hair products. Not only is curly hair drier than other hair types, it’s also more affected by humidity—making groomed glamorous waves even more of a challenge.

Hydration’s the key. With TRESemmé Flawless Curls system with vitamin B1, give your hair the moisture it needs to detangle and tame frizz for strands ready to be styled into flawless curls- every time.

This conditioner for curly hair replenishes moisture to your hair’s driest areas, providing optimal curl hydration to detangle hair and tame frizz.
productsDetail.aboutThisProductBullets:
• TRESemmé Flawless Curls Conditioner for flawless, professional-quality curls

• Hydrating conditioner, enriched with vitamin B1, is gentle enough for daily use

• Provides optimal curl hydration by targeting the driest areas with moisture where your hair needs it most

• Inspired by the professionals, this conditioner for curly hair is deal for curly or wavy hair, leaving you with strands that are ready to be styled into flawless curls

• Works great alongside other TRESemmé Flawless Curls Collection Products

• Finish with TRESemmé styling products to get the look you desire!

productsDetail.howToUseDescription:
Our Experts' Tips:
  • Start with TRESemmé Flawless Curls Shampoo.
  • Apply first from mid-shaft to ends an adequate amount based on hair length.
  • Work anything that's left through roots.
  • Run a wide-tooth comb or fingers from roots to ends to detangle and fully coat hair.
  • Leave on 2-3 minutes, rinse thoroughly and style with your favorite TRESemmé Flawless Curls styling aids as needed.
productsDetail.perfectForHeadingsAndDescription: Curly hair shampoo nourishes and strengthens for flawless ringlets and waves
productsDetail.aboutThisProductDescription:
Because you shouldn’t have to go a day without salon-healthy hair, the TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo & Conditioner system delivers optimized hydration that targets dryness and locks in moisture where your hair needs it most--- everyday.

Created for daily use, TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo & Conditioner restores vibrancy for a salon-healthy look and shine.

This lightweight conditioner with vitamin E works with the moisturizing shampoo to brilliantly revive dry and damaged hair without weighing it down. The result: hydration and soft hair with salon shine!

Fragrance Description: Mouthwatering melon, crisp apple and juicy peach are the stars of this fresh fruity fragrance. Delicate spring florals of muguet, rose and jasmine, underscored with white musk add a feminine sophistication.

productsDetail.howToUseDescription:
Our Experts' Tips:
  • Start with TRESemmé Moisture Rich Shampoo.
  • Apply first from mid-shaft to ends an adequate amount on hair length.
  • Work anything that's left through roots.
  • Run a wide-tooth comb or fingers from roots to ends to detangle and fully coat hair.
  • Leave on 2-3 minutes, rinse thoroughly.
  • Finish with your favorite TRESemmé styling aids as needed.

image.title:
DRYING PHASE

Once hair is all detangled and aligned, curls can be defined by applying specific products to create bridges between strands. Definition must withstand the drying process, and hair gets its best typically when left to dry naturally, instead of heat dry. Stiff, crunchy feel can be major turn off, so here some suggestions to work for your desire of soft, bouncy, well defined curls:

drying phase

productsDetail.tryThisDesctiption: Want lasting hold and a style that moves with you? TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Sprays has you covered. With breakthrough technology, these compressed hair sprays deliver a weightless  mist, ensuring lasting hold while maintaining natural movement. TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Sprays are specially designed to deliver great performance with 50% less gas than our traditional 11oz cans. These smaller, sleek new bottles have the same amount of product and last you as long as the traditional 11oz cans. Create your hairstyles with TRESemmé products and finish with one of the Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Sprays (at four different levels of hold) so you can lock in your style from day to night.
productsDetail.longPageDescription: Need your hairstyle to hold from day to night? TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Spray Smooth Extend Level 4 gives your look the hold it needs without that stiff feeling.
productsDetail.shortTitle: Compressed Micro Mist Level 4 Hair Spray
productsDetail.aboutThisProductBullets:
• TRESemmé Compressed Micro-Mist Hair Spray Smooth Extend Level 4 gives you all day hold for your boldest looks… without the stiffness of traditional hair spray. Get a natural, flexible hold that moves with you while keeping humidity at bay. This hair spray is fast-drying and humidity resistant, leaving you with a look you can rock (and stays in place). 

• The revolutionary micro-mist formula delivers great performance with 50% less gas than our traditional 11oz cans. The superfine micro-mist penetrates through the top layer of hair, providing deeper coverage throughout. Natural movement, flexibility, and a lasting hold… all in one sleek new 5.5oz can.

productsDetail.tryThisDesctiption: TRESemmé Flawless Curls Curl Defining Gel eliminates frizz and gives your curls the definition you crave.
productsDetail.longPageDescription:
Curls need work and the right curly hair products. Not only is curly hair drier than other hair types, it’s also more affected by humidity—making groomed glamorous waves even more of a challenge.

Hydration’s the key. TRESemmé Bouncy Curls Defining Gel transforms your unruly, frizzy curls into defined and bouncy ringlets with its humidity-resistant formula. This curly hair gel provides a moveable hold without crunchiness and leaves your hair looking shiny and fabulous. The gel is alcohol-free so it will not dry or flatten your hair, giving you long-lasting frizz control for healthy-looking curls.
productsDetail.shortTitle: Flawless Curls Bouncy Curls Defining Gel
productsDetail.aboutThisProductBullets:
• TRESemmé Bouncy Curls Defining Gel creates the hold your curls need

productsDetail.howToUseDescription:
Our Experts' Tips:
  • Prep your hair with TRESemmé Flawless Curls Shampoo and Conditioner:
  • Dispense desired amount and rub hands together to activate ingredients. Apply on damp hair and comb through from roots to ends.
  • Mold curls into shape using your hands and blow-dry with a diffuser until hair is almost dry. Then let air-dry.
  • Finish off with TRESemmé Flawless Curls Finishing Spray.

products.description: Hang onto that hairstyle for even longer. Infused with Vitamin B12 and Keratin, TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo is our secret weapon to refresh dry, dull hair between washes by removing excess oil and impurities.
products.title: Between Washes Basic Care Dry Shampoo

productsDetail.longPageDescription: Hang onto that hairstyle for even longer. Infused with Vitamin B12 and Keratin, TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo is our secret weapon to refresh dry, dull hair between washes by removing excess oil and impurities.
productsDetail.shortTitle: Between Washes Basic Care Dry Shampoo
productsDetail.aboutThisProductBullets:
• When you take the time to style your hair, you want it to last. The key to avoiding flat, lackluster hair is finding a dry shampoo that removes excess oil and delivers a boost of extra body.

• Infused with Vitamin B12 and Keratin, TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo is loaded with everything you need to keep your second day hair looking like you just styled it. 

• Perfect for all hair types, our weightless TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo transforms worn and dull hair into hair that looks clean, healthy and totally restored. 

• The best part? This oil absorbing dry shampoo won’t leave any visible residue, so you can make a hair statement and conquer the day whether you’re in between washes or you’re just looking for a hair refresh.

productsDetail.howToUseDescription:
• Simply shake and spray TRESemmé Basic Care Dry Shampoo on lifted sections of dry hair, 8-12 inches from roots (where hair is most oily)
  • Massage the odor eliminating dry shampoo onto your scalp using your fingertips to absorb oil evenly.
  • Brush through to remove excess oil and impurities, while eliminating odor.
